description: This file defines the interface for the HdcpProfile class, which serves as a server for JSONRPC communication in the WPEFramework plugin architecture. It declares methods for handling HDCP status, HDMI output events, and registration, along with private and public members relevant to the plugin's operation.

classes.name: HdcpProfile
classes.description: A plugin class that manages HDCP profile interactions over JSONRPC, handling initialization, deinitialization, status retrieval, and HDMI events.

methods.name: getHDCPStatusWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper method to retrieve HDCP status, callable via JSONRPC.

methods.name: getSettopHDCPSupportWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper method to check set-top HDCP support, callable via JSONRPC.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with shell services, setting up necessary components.

methods.name: string Information() const
methods.description: Returns plugin information as a string.

ctags.name: HdcpProfile
ctags.pattern: /^        class HdcpProfile : public PluginHost::IPlugin, public PluginHost::JSONRPC {$/

ctags.name: Information
ctags.pattern: /^            virtual string Information() const override { return {}; }$/
